{"id":399131912,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 years, 2 months","timestamp":1600765098,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"44 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/399131912/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Roman to Integer","memory":"7.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int romanToInt(string s) {\n        int convetedValue = 0;\n        unordered_map<char, int> roman ={{'I', 1}, {'V', 5}, {'X', 10},  {'L', 50}, {'C', 100}, {'D', 500}, {'M', 1000} };\n        \n        for(int i = 0; i<s.length(); i++) \n        {\n            //cout << s.at(i) << endl;\n            if(roman.find(s.at(i)) != roman.end())\n            {\n                //cout << roman.at(s.at(i)) << endl;\n                if(((i+1) < s.length()) and (roman.at(s.at(i)) < roman.at(s.at(i+1))))\n                {\n                    convetedValue = convetedValue - roman.at(s.at(i));\n                }\n                else\n                {\n                    convetedValue =  convetedValue + roman.at(s.at(i));\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return convetedValue;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"roman-to-integer","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
